caption.center: EBENEZER VINSON, MILLEY DORMAN, Widow, and SARAH SAUNDERS, Widow, three
of the Heirs-at-law of George Vinson, a Lunatic, v. GEORGE H. VINSON,
Trustee in the lifetime of said George Vinson, of him the said George

opinion.opinion_text: [For this case, see 1 Del. Ch. 120.] [Miscellaneous entries and orders of the Orphans' Court appear here, Ridgely's Notebook III, 161-162.]Page 571
